title: Arsen Rabinovich – Semrush profileAuthor Photo
description: Semrush's digital marketing blog is an innovative resource for content strategy, content marketing, SEO, SEM, PPC, social media and more.
content: Pagination: You’re Doing It Wrong! (Part 1)There seems to still be a lot of confusion surrounding the issue of pagination — what it is, what’s its real purpose, when should it be employed, how to implement it properly, should it be combined with a canonical and more. This first part of a series of three articles will help you navigate through and answer all of your pagination questions.Technical SEOJan 21, 2019
